### Lists

```{r}
vec_numeric = 1:4
vec_char = c("my", "name", "is", "wendy")

tibble(
  num = vec_numeric,
  char = vec_char
)

```


Different stuff with different lengths
```{r}
l = 
  list(
    vec_numeric = 1:5,
    vec_char = LETTERS,
    matrix = matrix(1:10, nrow = 5, ncol = 2),
    summary = summary(rnorm(100))
  )
```
